title: BROVAVE Womens 2025 Summer Sleeveless Shirt Dress Collar Striped V Neck Casual Midi Dresses
description: Size Guide: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=16, Please choose the right size according to the size chart in the picture
Material: Soft and breathable fabric makes this flowy dress comfortable and feminine to wear.
Feature: sleeveless, v neck, button front, stripe printing, this casual style dress is generous and elegant that giving you a stylish flattering look.
Occasions: office, vacation, party, wedding, date, night out or pregnant wear.
Model is 5'9" height, 33" Bust, 24" waist, 34" hip, and wearing a size S.
